title: SO2 and O2 rxn - bond energy

content.question: Bond Type Bond Energy (<math alttext="in kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) Sulfur-oxygen bond in <math alttext="S O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>SO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="530" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>530</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Oxygen-oxygen bond in <math alttext="O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="500" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>500</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Sulfur-oxygen bond in <math alttext="S O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>SO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="question mark" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <semantics> <mo>?</mo> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahGart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaGG=aaaaa@39C1@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> Based on the bond energies given in the table and the value of <math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, which of the following is the best estimate for the energy of one of the sulfur-oxygen bonds in <math alttext="S O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>SO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="403 kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>403</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="470 kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>470</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="880 kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>880</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="1410 kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1410</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="470 kilojoules per mole" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>470</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
